## Discussion

The system references this key to determine the preferred initial scene session role to create the first scene for your app. If you specify [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication] or [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/CPSceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication], the system creates an immersive space scene which connects to your application at launch. To define the style that [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication] uses initially, use the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication/UISceneInitialImmersionStyle] key.

# UIApplicationPreferredDefaultSceneSessionRole

**Property List Key**

The preferred initial scene session role for your app.

## Discussion

The system references this key to determine the preferred initial scene session role to create the first scene for your app. If you specify [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication] or [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/CPSceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication], the system creates an immersive space scene which connects to your application at launch. To define the style that [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication] uses initially, use the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication/UISceneInitialImmersionStyle] key.

## Main user interface

- **UIApplicationSceneManifest**: The information about the app’s scene-based life-cycle support.
- **NSMainStoryboardFile**: The name of an app’s storyboard resource file.
- **UIMainStoryboardFile**: The name of the app’s main storyboard file.
- **NSMainNibFile**: The name of an app’s main user interface file.
- **LSUIElement**: A Boolean value indicating whether the app is an agent app that runs in the background and doesn’t appear in the Dock.
- **UISupportsTrueScreenSizeOnMac**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your iPad app supports arbitrary screen sizes and resolutions when running on a Mac.
